articles.title: Unacademy sacks teacher who asked students to vote for educated candidates - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Unacademy has sacked a teacher, Karan Sangwan, who appealed students to vote for educated candidates, with the edtech firm saying that classroom is not a place to share personal opinions and views.
